content: What's a good way to work with CDA received inside FHIR Binary resources? I was hoping for a ClinicalDocument class in HAPI FHIR, but I cannot find one. The closest I found was CDAUtilities.java, but that doesn't seem like it's designed to reveal its private Document.
There is a stream here for #cda to fhir
There are some projects to provide the solution for coveting CDA to FHIR - Search on "CDA-on-FHIR"
Thank you for the stream and the search advice!
